argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | mirval.p | |- P = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | mirval.d | |- .- = ( dist ` G ) |
| 3 |  | mirval.i | |- I = ( Itv ` G ) |
| 4 |  | mirval.l | |- L = ( LineG ` G ) |
| 5 |  | mirval.s | |- S = ( pInvG ` G ) |
| 6 |  | mirval.g | |- ( ph -> G e. TarskiG ) |
| 7 |  | mirval.a | |- ( ph -> A e. P ) |
| 8 |  | mirfv.m | |- M = ( S ` A ) |
| 9 |  | #P_eqid | |- A = A |
| 10 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 7 | #P_mirinv | |- ( ph -> ( ( M ` A ) = A <-> A = A ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_mpbiri | |- ( ph -> ( M ` A ) = A ) |
